title: So Much For Illusion
description: Illusions of the extravagant Las Vegas shows is the backdrop for this spicy story of misplaced love. Erica finds love with Nick, a troubled artist, who tells her his work comes first.Rejected, she falls in love with Tony. Does she marry Tony on the rebound? Is this real love?When Erica's first love re-enters her life, all illusions are revealed in a moment of truth. But has Erica placed her life in danger and her marriage in jeopardy just for an illusion of love?
author: Deborah McClatchey
